See Joel Hay Debunk 5 Myths

Myth 1: Our Society is Still at Great Risk of Death Due to COVID-19


Myth 2: Contact Tracing and Rapid Testing are Effective Measures to Stop the Spread of COVID-19.


Myth 3: Government Officials Have the Skills and Knowledge to Objectively Weigh the Cost/Benefit of Lockdown.



Myth 4: It is Reasonable to Wait For an Effective Vaccine Before Re-opening the Economy.



Myth 5: A Controlled Reopening is Extremely Risky and Achieving Herd Immunity This Way is Unrealistic.
